selectedVerses.text: Happy are you, O Israel! Who is like you, a people saved by the LORD, the shield of your help, and the sword of your triumph! Your enemies shall come fawning to you, and you shall tread upon their backs."
You brought us into the net; you laid a crushing burden on our backs;
You made my enemies turn their backs to me, and those who hated me I destroyed.
I will send my terror before you and will throw into confusion all the people against whom you shall come, and I will make all your enemies turn their backs to you.
You made my enemies turn their backs to me, those who hated me, and I destroyed them.
